original_title: Five Year Diary, Reel 2: The Definitions of Fat and Thin (December 13–22, 1981)
overview: Anne consults the dictionary in this one – what is “fat?” what is “thin?” Inanimate objects are animated, and Anne experiences problems with her camera. (Liz Coffey)
title: Five Year Diary, Reel 2: The Definitions of Fat and Thin (December 13–22, 1981)
